description: Long-Term Student Visa (Type D) for studies exceeding 90 days in Spain.

meta.processing_time_standard: 1-2 Months (Apply at least 2-3 months in advance)
meta.max_stay: Duration of study program (TIE required for >6 months)
meta.passport_validity: At least 1 year beyond intended stay
meta.photo_spec: 35x45mm, white background, face forward, no glasses
meta.min_funds_requirement: **100% IPREM** (600 EUR/month) = 7,200 EUR/year. Add 450 EUR/month for first dependent.

documents.title: National Visa Application Form
documents.description: Two completed and signed application forms. Blue ink signature.

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Valid for at least 1 year. Minimum 2 blank pages. Issued within last 10 years.

documents.title: Two Recent Photographs
documents.description: 35x45mm, white background, glued to the application forms.

documents.title: Admission Letter
documents.description: Original acceptance letter from a Spanish university/institution. Must state program dates and fees.

documents.title: Proof of Financial Means
documents.description: Bank statements (last 6 months), ITR (last 3 years). Min 7,200 EUR/year (100% IPREM).

documents.title: Health Insurance
documents.description: Public or private health insurance from an entity authorized to operate in Spain. Full coverage, no copay.

documents.title: Medical Certificate
documents.description: Issued by a doctor (M.B.B.S or higher), stating freedom from diseases under IHR 2005. Apostilled & Translated.

documents.title: Police Clearance Certificate (PCC)
documents.description: Issued by Passport Office (PSK). Apostilled & Translated into Spanish. Valid for 6 months.

documents.title: Homologación Proof
documents.description: Proof of application for recognition of previous studies (if required by university).

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Rental agreement, dorm booking, or letter of invitation for the duration of studies.

steps_flow.title: University Admission
steps_flow.description: Apply and receive the official Admission Letter from a Spanish institution.

steps_flow.title: Prepare Documents
steps_flow.description: Get Medical Cert and PCC. Apostille them and get Sworn Translations.

steps_flow.title: Book BLS Appointment
steps_flow.description: Schedule a National Visa appointment at BLS International (Delhi/Mumbai).

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit application in person with all original documents and copies.

steps_flow.title: Collect Visa & Apply for TIE
steps_flow.description: Collect visa. After arriving in Spain, apply for TIE (Foreigner Identity Card) within 1 month.

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

required_exams: Spanish Language Test (DELE/SIELE) - B2 level usually required

pre_visa_steps.title: Check UNED Requirements
pre_visa_steps.description: Determine if you need UNED accreditation for your high school diploma.

pre_visa_steps.title: Homologación
pre_visa_steps.description: Start the process of degree recognition (can take time).
